about_the_game:
Conquer, Strategize, and Save from the Dangers of Chilling Fog!

Master simple yet addictive gameplay: drag to send troops, conquer houses, and outwit enemies trying to destroy your forces. As you progress, unlock movable heroes that change the game with powerful abilities and unique playstyles.

Features:

  • Upgrade troops and heroes to gain the upper hand.

  • Collect chests, uncover rare items, and equip your heroes through the inventory system.

  • Test your skills across 40+ challenging levels.

Story:
In the realm of Eldoria, a sinister fog blankets the land, corrupting everything in its path. Ancient prophecies foretell a rising evil, and brave villagers must rise to defend their homes. Unite, strategize, and lead them to victory!

Join the community!
Share feedback, suggest new features, and shape the future of this game and upcoming titles on our Discord channel.

The battle for Eldoria awaits—are you ready to lead?
